text: Do 20 pushups right now or finish your drink.
Send a random emoji to the last person you texted.
Let the person on your right post something on your Instagram story.
Take a shot without using your hands.
Read out loud your last 5 Google searches.
Speak in an accent until your next turn.
Swap shirts with the person next to you.
Let someone look through your camera roll for 30 seconds.
Call your crush right now or take two shots.
Dance on the table for 30 seconds.
Let the group look at your Tinder/DMs for 1 minute.
Eat or drink a weird mix of 3 things chosen by the group.
Do your best impression of someone here until the group guesses who it is.
Wear socks on your hands until your next turn.
Let someone draw on your face with a marker.
Try to rap about everyone in the room.
Pretend to flirt with the person on your left for 1 minute.
Let the group go through your Spotify playlists for 1 minute.
Take a sip for every ex youâ€™ve had.
Do your best sexy dance for 20 seconds.
